full_summary:
### Tender Announcement - Strap Assembly and Harness (ATAL)

#### Procurement Information

* **Title:** Strap Assembly and Harness (ATAL)
* **Reference Number:** W8485-247841/B
* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-14
* **Closing Date:** 2024-01-31 14:00
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of Strap Assembly, ATAL Harness (1670 NSN: 1670-20-008-2301). The delivery is expected to Trenton by March 2024. Bidders can submit their proposals electronically through the epost Connect service. Kindly refer to the Bid Solicitation document for further details.

#### Specifications

* **Item 1:** Strap Assembly, ATAL Harness
	+ Part Number: 0827506-1
	+ Quantity: 75
	+ NSF: 1670-20-008-2301
* **Substitutions:** Bidders offering an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name, model, and/or Part Number. NCAGE: 36376

#### Selection Criteria

* **Selection Process:** Lowest Price

#### Additional Information

* **Languages of Submission:** Either official language of Canada
* **Crown Reserve:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* **Contact Information:** Audree Poissant-Viau, audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
* **Attachments:** Available at [tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-eng](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27579/w8485-247841.b---rfp-canada-buys_0.pdf) and [tenderDescription-descriptionAppelOffres-fra](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27579/w8485-247841.b---ddp-achats-canada_0.pdf)

Please let me know if you need me to change anything. 

Also, let me know if there is anything else you'd like me to assist you with.
Best regards,
[Your Name]

Attachments  
* [CN text](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27579/w8485-247841.b---rfp-canada-buys_0.pdf)
